FooterContent.oneSub: DownloadTheVideo.online is a powerful online tool that allows users to download their favorite videos from over 100 platforms, including Facebook, VK, Twitter, TikTok, and Instagram.
FooterContent.twoSub: DownloadTheVideo.online supports over 100 platforms, including social networks like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn, as well as video platforms like Vimeo and Dailymotion.
FooterContent.threeSub: Yes, DownloadTheVideo.online is completely free. We believe in making digital content accessible to everyone without any cost.
FooterContent.fourTit: Is it legal to download videos using DownloadTheVideo.online?
FooterContent.fourSub: It depends on the video and its copyright status. Users are responsible for respecting the copyright policies of the platforms and content creators.
FooterContent.fiveTit: What should I do if the video download doesn't start?
FooterContent.fiveSub: First, check your internet connection. If the issue persists, try refreshing the page or restarting your browser.
FooterContent.sixTit: What video quality can I expect?
FooterContent.sixSub: The quality of the downloaded video depends on the original upload. If the original supports HD or 4K, you can download it in the same quality.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.titleSub: Here you can find answers to common questions.

content.oneContent: Yes, DownloadTheVideo.online is completely free and will remain free. However, we use ads to cover the costs of running and maintaining the service.
content.twoTitle: Can I download videos from YouTube?
content.twoContent: No, downloading videos from YouTube is no longer supported.
content.threeContent: DownloadTheVideo.online runs online and supports all operating systems, including Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and others.
content.fourTitle: Can I use DownloadTheVideo.online on mobile and tablet devices?
content.fourContent: Yes, DownloadTheVideo.online works on devices of any screen size, including phones and tablets.
content.fiveContent: We only support modern browsers. For the best experience, please use the latest version of your preferred browser.
content.sixTitle: What should I do if I encounter an error?
content.sixContent: First, ensure the link is correct and the video is not private or requires login. If the issue persists, contact us.
content.sevenTitle: Can I download only the audio from a video?
content.sevenContent: Some websites provide audio files. If no audio download button is available, you can convert the video to formats like MP3, M4A, WAV, or AAC.

content.one: You can use DownloadTheVideo.online anonymously without providing personal information. However, like most websites, we collect non-personal information to better understand how visitors use our site.
content.two: We also collect potentially personal information, such as your IP address, to prevent misuse and ensure our services are available to everyone.
content.three: We do not store personal information on our servers unless necessary for the operation of our services, and we do not share your personal information with anyone.

content.intro: Information collected by DownloadTheVideo.online and third-party services:

content.one: Cookies are text files stored on your computer. We use cookies to improve your experience, enhance our services, and personalize ads and content.

two.text: We use Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage information. Google Analytics may use tracking cookies to collect data on browsers, operating systems, and navigation.

three.text: We use PropellerAds to serve ads. PropellerAds uses cookies to deliver relevant ads. PropellerAds cookies do not collect personal information. You can learn more on the privacy policy page or opt out using this page.

content.one: This website may contain links to other sites. We are not responsible for their content or privacy policies. Please read the privacy policies of any site that collects personal information.
DownloadTheVideo.online may change its privacy policy as needed. Significant changes will be announced on the homepage. By continuing to use the site, you accept these changes.
